body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, my name is Patrick Moore and I'm from A1 Auto Sales. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello Patrick, my name is Ashley Foster.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Ashley. Can you please provide me with your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my number is five five five, four six seven, eight nine zero one.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Ashley. And can you also let me know your email address?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my email is ashley.foster@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you for providing that information, Ashley. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, I'm good for now. Thank you, Patrick.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Ashley. Thank you for your time. Have a wonderful day.
